body_html:
If I understand the experiment correctly, you are seeing that total memory usage does not go above per_process_gpu_memory_fraction with UVM. Is that correct? That seems to be working as intended and consistent with the mode without UVM.

could you describe your use-case requiring total memory to go above per_process_gpu_memory_fraction? wouldn't it be enough to set per_process_gpu_memory_fraction to a very high number and enable allow_growth option?
